publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1325.1 Irene McGugan: Sport-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1325) in the name of Mr Sam Galbraith, insert at end "accepting that the overall purposes of a sport policy should be to involve as many as possible, to encourage diversity, to sustain not only mainstream but also minority sports, including traditional Scottish sports, and to ensure a high level of international standard sporting excellence in Scotland." Supported by: Michael Russell*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Shona Robison*
